articles.title: Bronx, Brooklyn, Queens experienced dramatic population declines in 2022 as Manhattan rebounded - New York Post
articles.description: Three of Gotham’s five boroughs saw some of the largest population declines in America last fiscal year, with only Manhattan bucking the post-COVID trend, according to US Census data released…
articles.content:
